SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package services

Class EnquiryResponderService

java.lang.Object
services.EnquiryResponderService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEnquiryResponderService
public class EnquiryResponderService extends Object implements IEnquiryResponderService
The EnquiryResponderService class implements the IEnquiryResponderService interface and provides services for handling enquiries to support responding to enquiries related to a camp.

  • Method Details

    • getAllPendingEnquiriesForCamp

      public Map<Integer,Enquiry> getAllPendingEnquiriesForCamp(Camp camp)
      Retrieves all pending enquiries for a specific camp.
      Specified by:
      getAllPendingEnquiriesForCamp in interface IEnquiryResponderService
      Parameters:
      camp - The Camp for which to retrieve pending enquiries.
      Returns:
      A Map of pending enquiries, where the key is the enquiry ID and the value is the Enquiry object.

    • getAllEnquiriesForCamp

      public Map<Integer,Enquiry> getAllEnquiriesForCamp(Camp camp)
      Retrieves all enquiries for a specific camp, excluding draft enquiries.
      Specified by:
      getAllEnquiriesForCamp in interface IEnquiryResponderService
      Parameters:
      camp - The Camp for which to retrieve enquiries.
      Returns:
      A Map of enquiries, where the key is the enquiry ID and the value is the Enquiry object.

    • respondToEnquiry

      public boolean respondToEnquiry(int enquiryID, String responderID, MessageStatus status, String response)
      Responds to a specific enquiry with the provided details.
      Specified by:
      respondToEnquiry in interface IEnquiryResponderService
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The ID of the enquiry to respond to.
      responderID - The ID of the responder.
      status - The status of the response, such as MessageStatus.ACCEPTED or MessageStatus.REJECTED.
      response - The response message to the enquiry.
      Returns:
      true if the response is successful, false otherwise.
